metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000998 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: FreeBSD CVSweb version 2.x contains a Cross Site Scripting (XSS)vulnerability in all pages that can result in limited impact--CVSweb isanonymous & read-only. It might impact other sites on same domain. Thisattack appears to be exploitable via victim must load specially craftedurl. This vulnerability appears to have been fixed in 3.x.

criterions.comment: cvsweb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
